name: Spheritis
description: Spheritis is a 3D race & puzzle game. Explore the single player levels and beat your friends high scores on the Spheritis leader boards. Also included are Steam achievements and Steam Cloud to save your progress in the single player campaign.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp or later. Processor: Intel core 2 duo or later. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 1000 series or later.  nVidea GeForce 7 series or later. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7 or later. Processor: Intel core i3 or later. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 5000 series or later. nVidea geForce 400 series or later. DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
